description:
One Agency Property Partners presents 4 Elswick Way, Point Cook. Set within the immaculate Saltwater Coast Estate and boasting breathtaking bay views, this is one of Point Cooks most desirable locations. A home of magnitude and sophistication this phenomenal Porter Davis residence offers a flowing floorplan with three living zones, plus four bedrooms, two bathrooms, separate office, and accommodation for two vehicles. Befitting the seasoned entertainer, the home is complete with a beautiful decked outdoor area, with established greenery and a covered alfresco.

- Spanning an incredible 41 squares (approx.), this property offers an array of living spaces throughout, the generous lower level with freshly polished solid spotted gum hardwood flooring offers an open plan family and meals space and separate study, as well as a carpeted theatre room and separate powder room. Upstairs a large living area provides great flexibility and encompasses a balcony with breathtaking views of the Cheetham wetlands and Port Phillip Bay.
- With meticulous appointments, the kitchen offers a central island with breakfast bar, elegant hanging lights, 40mm stone countertops, plumbed fridge space and an abundance of storage, with overhead cabinetry and a walk-in pantry. Stainless-steel appliances include a 900mm upright gas cooker and dishwasher, complemented by a glass splash back.
- Extending from the kitchen, the seemingly integrated alfresco is accessed via two separate four-leaf cedar bi-fold doors. With matching spotted gum timber decking underfoot and an outdoor fan overhead, family and friends will enjoy gathering in style. Beyond the alfresco is a large grassed area for the kids to enjoy time outside, surrounding the back of the home are established gardens with hedges and bangalow palms that offer great privacy, and on the side a herb garden as well as a mini orchid with trees including apples, lemon, lime and orange.
- For large families, accommodation of this home includes four bedrooms, each located on the upper level of the property, three of which contain built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom containing double vanity and a freestanding bath. The spacious master bedroom comes equipped with an oversize walk in robe, spacious ensuite with double basins and a spa bath.
- Further highlights include a double remote-control garage with internal access as well as drive-through access to the back, a separate laundry, guest powder room, under stair storage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, outdoor shed, seven new double glazed windows and LED downlights throughout all common areas.

Residents of Saltwater Coast Estate enjoy exclusive access to the Saltwater Coast Lifestyle Centre, complete with swimming pools, jacuzzi, tennis courts, a function room and cafe. Local amenities include Sanctuary Lakes Shopping Centre and IGA Saltwater, while attractions include Saltwater Reserve, Saltwater Coast Crocodile Park, Saltwater Coast Wetlands and Point Cook Coastal Park. For students Saltwater P-9 College, Homestead Senior Secondary College and St Mary of the Cross are all within walking distance, while commuters will enjoy public transport options including Williams Landing station and well-serviced bus routes.

Note. All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
